skills.skill: Understanding of Montessori principles and curriculum models
Passion for working with young children

duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach and design lesson plans for students aged 3-5 years old in a bilingual environment.
Develop students' cognitive, language, and social-emotional skills.
Work with a team of teachers and staff to foster a love of learning in young children.

education_certification.credential: At least one year of experience teaching preschool-aged children. Bachelor's degree in Education or related field (Master's preferred).
